T02D2471:143b-1: pa ra wa sha m'a na /
T02D2471:143b-3: pha rol dbang du bya ba /
T02D2471:143b-4: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2471:143b-5: shin tu snying rjes non pa'i yid //
T02D2471:143b-6: lus can mya ngan 'das pa la //
T02D2471:143b-7: bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer ba //
T02D2471:143b-8: de yis pha rol bsdu ba bshad //
T02D2471:143b-9: nam langs mun pas slebs pa dang //
T02D2471:143b-10: gnyid du nye dang sad pa'i dus //
T02D2471:143b-11: dga' dang gdung ba skyes pa nas //
T02D2471:143b-12: de yi cho ga spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2471:143b-13: bdag gi lus gang lha yin te //
T02D2471:143b-14: ngag ni yi ge bzhi nyid do //
T02D2471:143b-15: rnam par rtog dang mi rtog sems //
T02D2471:143b-16: snying rje che dang stong pa nyid //
T02D2471:143b-17: mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba dang //
T02D2471:143b-18: lce steng a'a ka'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2471:143b-19: lte ba me thab 'khyil pa'i dbus //
T02D2471:143b-20: dpal ldan 'dod pa'i lha mo yi //
T02D2471:143b-21: mi gang dbang du bya ba de'i //
T02D2471:143b-22: smin phrag snying dang lte pa'i dbus //
T02D2471:143b-23: dga' dang dad dang gdung ba nyid //
T02D2471:143b-24: thig le padmo aa yig gzugs //
T02D2471:143b-25: byams pa yi ge aa yi rgyun //
T02D2471:143b-26: bdag gi sprul pa las skyes reg / rab tu mi bzod snying rje can //
T02D2471:143b-27: dga' ba'i blta bas rnam par bzhu //
T02D2471:143b-28: btang snyoms tshad med blo gros che //
T02D2471:143b-31: 'bum phrag lngar ba ma yengs dang //
T02D2471:143b-32: lhag pas bar chad spangs bsnyen bsgrub //
T02D2471:143b-33: bde gshegs ring bsrel sku khrus sogs //
T02D2471:143b-34: brtse ldan rnams kyis sngags chur bcas //
T02D2471:143b-35: me tog dmar pos gdong bkrus la //
T02D2471:143b-36: lce dkyil sbrang rtsi ldan sngags brjod //
T02D2471:143b-37: aom a'a:hr'i lo ka n'a tha ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ho sa ma ham /
T02D2471:143b-38: che ge mo'i tsitta mah'a s'a dha tsal tsal pra
T02D2471:143b-39: tsa la pra tsa la dza:dza: blo gros bzang po
T02D2471:143b-41: skye po 'di dag thabs gang phrin las kyis //
T02D2471:143b-42: bde bar rung na bdag cir gyur sla'o zhes //
T02D2471:143b-43: nyin mtshan rtag tu yid byed mi 'bral na //
T02D2471:143b-45: zhag gsum drug gam dgu nyid na //
T02D2471:143b-46: lcags kyus bzhugs pa'i yal ga ltar //
T02D2471:143b-47: gdon mi za bar de dbang 'gyur //
